#summary How to run Copymark2.

= Command line syntax =
Run Copymark2 using this syntax:
{{{
python copymark2.py [options] <source dir> <target dir> <workload file>
}}}

= Command line options =
=== Calibration mode ===
 * -c or --calibrate
 * *Boolean*
 * Automatically calibrate file counts. Defaults to True.
 * [Calibration More information about Calibration mode].

=== Calibration heuristic ===
 * -H or -heuristic
 * *String*
 * Specify an external calibration heuristic.
 * [Calibration More information about Calibration heuristics].

=== Log file ===
 * -l or --logfile
 * *String*
 * Specify a log file. Defaults to log.csv.
 * [Results More information about Copymark2 log files].
